L-grass documentation¶

Module description¶

Summary

Version:1.0
Release:1.0
Date:Jun 26, 2018
Author:See Authors section
ChangeLog:See ChangeLog section

Overview

L-grass, A Functional Structural Plant Model of ryegrass morphogenesis of leaf and roots, based on self regulations.

Documentation¶

  • User Guide
    • Introduction
    • Implementation and architecture
    • Running an example
  • Reference Guide
    • lgrass package

Contact¶

For any question, send an email to lgrass-request@groupes.renater.fr.

Versioning¶

Sources are versioned on Git repository hosted by https://sourcesup.renater.fr. If you need an access to the current in development version of the model, please send an email to lgrass-request@groupes.renater.fr.

Authors¶

  • Alban VERDENAL - model design, development and validation for aerial morphogensis. Implemented in Lstudio platform.
  • Didier COMBES (didier.combes@inra.fr) - scientific project management, implementation of the model from Lstudio to Lpy platform.
  • Vincent MIGAULT - model design, development and validation for root morphogensis.

Contributors¶

  • Abraham ESCOBAR-GUTIERREZ (abraham.escobar-gutierrez@inra.fr) - model designing and validation, scientific project management

ChangeLog¶

L-Grass 1.0¶

First version of L-Grass.

License¶

lgrass is released under CeCILL-C License. See file LICENSE for details.
